## Vector3.CatmullRom() method

Returns a new Vector3 located for "amount" on the CatmullRom interpolation spline defined by the vectors "value1", "value2", "value3", "value4"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static CatmullRom(value1: ReadOnlyVector3, value2: ReadOnlyVector3, value3: ReadOnlyVector3, value4: ReadOnlyVector3, amount: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the first control point |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second control point |
|  value3 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the third control point |
|  value4 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the fourth control point |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the amount on the spline to use |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the new Vector3
